fields.Title: PLAZA / GASTON CASE
START
input
Gaston Martin: ""Not in the technical sense..." His..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Not in the technical sense..." His eyes fix on the boules in the crater. "I don't have a vote or a membership card. But Evrart keeps me on the payroll. Just for the little things."

fields.Title: Drama: "So that's what it was, before! Him..."
fields.Dialogue Text: So that's what it was, before! Him hiding something. He tries to make it look like he's a big deal in the Union and now the illusion is disintegrating before your -- and Ren√©'s -- eyes.

fields.Title: You: ""Shame. Maybe you can help me with..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Shame. Maybe you can help me with something else then."

fields.Title: Jump to: [Gaston main HUB]
You: ""So you're not an actual member?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "So you're not an actual member?"

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "He means caviar-socialists."
fields.Dialogue Text: He means caviar-socialists.

fields.Title: Gaston Martin: ""Everyone in Martinaise knows the C..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Everyone in Martinaise knows the Claire brothers," he says solemnly. "I taught these boys human studies and history in the gymnasium."
fields.Alternate1: "Evrart *Claire*. Everyone in Martinaise knows the Claire brothers," he says solemnly. "I taught these boys human studies and history in the gymnasium."

fields.Title: Jump to: [Untitled hub (02)]
You: ""Are you a *caviar socialist*?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Are you a *caviar socialist*?"

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "There he stands. Proud, rigid, and..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There he stands. Proud, rigid, and alone, like a cracking marble statue.

fields.Title: Gaston Martin: ""Of course, officer, I hope I can h..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Of course, officer, I hope I can help you." He nods enthusiastically. "What's on your mind?"

fields.Title: Gaston Martin: ""Of course, officer, I mean I hope..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Of course, officer, I mean I hope I can." He nods enthusiastically. "What's on your mind?"

fields.Title: You: ""C'mon, you must have heard somethi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "C'mon, you must have heard something..."

fields.Title: Drama: "Odd... He doesn't seem to be lying,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Odd... He doesn't seem to be lying, but there's something off here.

fields.Title: You: ""What are the 'little things' you d..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What are the 'little things' you do for Evrart?"

You: ""I do 'little things' for Evrart to..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I do 'little things' for Evrart too. I feel terrible about it."

fields.Title: Ren√© Arnoux: ""Then help him, you wimp." Reproach..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Then help him, you wimp." Reproach fills his eyes. "You rub plenty of shoulder with the *gauche caviar* in the Union. Someone *must* know something."
fields.Alternate1: "Then help them, you wimp." Reproach fills his eyes. "You rub plenty of shoulder with the *gauche caviar* in the Union. *Someone* must know something."

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "He just fluffs it up."
fields.Dialogue Text: He just fluffs it up.

fields.Title: You: ""How do you know Evrart?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "How do you know Evrart?"

Gaston Martin: ""Oh..." His cheeks turn red again...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Oh..." His cheeks turn red again. "In many ways, yes. Like an honorary member. I attend meetings and parties. Help with little things. Evrart, Edgar, and the older *D√©bardeurs* all know me."

fields.Title: Jump to: [Untitled hub (02)]
You: ""Can you help me get inside the har..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Can you help me get inside the harbour?"

fields.Title: You: ""I do 'little things' for Evrart my..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I do 'little things' for Evrart myself. Nothing wrong with that."

fields.Title: You: ""Wait, how can you write those news..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Wait, how can you write those newspaper pieces if you're not *political*?"

fields.Title: Gaston Martin: ""Oh yes.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Oh yes."

fields.Title: You: ""Thanks, that's all for now." (Conc..."

Jump to: [Ren√© Arnoux: ""*Mon dieu*..." the carabineer clos..."]
Ren√© Arnoux: "The old soldier mumbles something u..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The old soldier mumbles something under his breath and turns to face the sea.

fields.Title: Gaston Martin: ""I don't even consider myself a reg..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't even consider myself a regular socialist. Politics is not really something I involve myself in, officer."

fields.Title: Jump to: [Gaston main HUB]
Esprit de Corps: "Lest we leave riddled with bullet h..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Lest we leave riddled with bullet holes. This animosity is ancient.

fields.Title: Logic: "That's why Gaston isn't a Union mem..."
fields.Dialogue Text: That's why Gaston isn't a Union member. Evrart needs a 'neutral' party to speak his ideas.

fields.Title: Jump to: [Untitled hub (02)]
Gaston Martin: ""I wish I could, but I just don't k..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I wish I could, but I just don't know anything." His cheeks turn red. "I always keep my nose clean and don't gossip. Everyone knows and respects that."

fields.Title: Ren√© Arnoux: ""Of course he's not a member! He's..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Of course he's not a member! He's not a member of anything. I knew that." He frowns. "He's a weathervane -- turns to where the wind blows and tries to look important."

fields.Title: Logic: "He doesn't know anything, because n..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He doesn't know anything, because no one tells him anything. He's an outsider.

fields.Title: Ren√© Arnoux: ""Where he tells his little *penman*..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Where he tells his little *penman* exactly what to say! It's commie propaganda, plain and simple. You should be ashamed of yourself."

fields.Title: You: ""That's smart. I keep my nose clean..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's smart. I keep my nose clean too."

fields.Title: Gaston Martin: ""Just easier that way," he nods in..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Just easier that way," he nods in approval. "Besides, life isn't as black and white as Ren√©'s of the World try to make it seem. It's all shades of grey really."

fields.Title: Ren√© Arnoux: ""*Mon dieu*..." the carabineer clos..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "*Mon dieu*..." the carabineer closes his eyes, like he's never going to open them again.

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "'Where were we' -- what a joyous wa..."
fields.Dialogue Text: 'Where were we' -- what a joyous way of putting it.

fields.Title: Variable["plaza.gaston_conze_rene_marble_statue"]
Variable["plaza.gaston_conze_rene_marble_statue"]
!(Variable["plaza.gaston_conze_rene_marble_statue"])
Ren√© Arnoux: ""What do *you* know about history?"..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What do *you* know about history?" The carabineer snaps at Gaston. "You never witnessed history. Only heard about it -- years later -- when it had already moved on. You don't know history."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Let's try not to get caught in the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Let's try not to get caught in the..." The lieutenant lowers his voice: "Crossfire."

fields.Title: Gaston Martin: ""Officer, I have a vivid imaginatio..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Officer, I have a vivid imagination." He laughs again. "And like I said, I have a way with words. That's enough. No need to sink into politics."

fields.Title: Perception (Hearing): ""*The blind leading the blind* does..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "*The blind leading the blind* doesn't even begin to describe it," is what he said.

fields.Title: Gaston Martin: ""What a prick," the jolly man decla..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What a prick," the jolly man declares, with a sigh. "The officer was addressing me, not you, *capitaine*. Where were we?"

fields.Title: Gaston Martin: ""Oh, nothing official, I assure you..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Oh, nothing official, I assure you. Just essays for the newspapers. About Martinaise and how things are and how they *could* be. Evrart and I have these long talks where..."

fields.Title: You: ""But you need to believe in *someth..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "But you need to believe in *something*. Freedom, the people, Revachol or even money..."

fields.Title: Gaston Martin: ""Writing work mostly," he smiles. "..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Writing work mostly," he smiles. "Occasionally he needs something written and I happen to have a way with words, people say."

fields.Title: Jump to: [Untitled hub (02)]
Ren√© Arnoux: ""Of course he's holding back." The..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Of course he's holding back." The carabineer crosses his arms. "His mouth is so full of Union prick he can't even speak properly."

fields.Title: You: ""All right then. Change of topic.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "All right then. Change of topic."

fields.Title: Ren√© Arnoux: ""Of course -- don't *sink* into any..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Of course -- don't *sink* into anything. Don't sink into any fight. Only sink into your couch."

fields.Title: Physical Instrument: "*Gymnasium*. I love that word."
fields.Dialogue Text: *Gymnasium*. I love that word.

fields.Title: Jump to: [Untitled hub (02)]
Reaction Speed: "Hmm... so Gaston taught both Easy L..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Hmm... so Gaston taught both Easy Leo and the Claire Brothers.

fields.Title: You: ""Let's stay on the track here, guys.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Let's stay on the track here, guys."

fields.Title: Gaston Martin: ""On the Union-track?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "On the Union-track?"

fields.Title: You: ""Really? You know *absolutely* noth..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Really? You know *absolutely* nothing?"

fields.Title: You: ""'In many ways'?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "'In many ways'?"

fields.Title: Jump to: [Gaston main HUB]
Gaston Martin: ""No, officers, I'm sorry. And I rea..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No, officers, I'm sorry. And I really *would* like to assist," he adds, smiling apologetically. "You are both good guys. I can see that."
fields.Alternate1: "No, I'm sorry. And I really *would* like to assist," he adds, smiling apologetically. "You are a good guy, officer. I can see that."

fields.Title: You: ""Are you a Union member?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Are you a Union member?"

fields.Title: You: ""What kind of things do you write f..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What kind of things do you write for him?"

fields.Title: Gaston Martin: ""I believe everyone has the right t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I believe everyone has the right to think and do whatever they want. Even if it's nothing at all. I'm very *adaptable*."

fields.Title: Gaston Martin: ""I'm *not*," he assures you. "I'm n..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm *not*," he assures you. "I'm not even anyo---"
fields.Alternate1: "No, no-no," he rushes to assure you. "I'm not holding anything back. I swear. I'm not even anyo---"

fields.Title: Gaston Martin: ""Thank you officer," he nods, smili..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Thank you officer," he nods, smiling wide. "For being a consummate professional. You'll have this case wrapped up in no time."
fields.Alternate1: "No, thank you," he nods, smiling wide. "For being consummate professionals. You'll have this case wrapped up in no time."

Untitled hub (02)

You: ""So you *are* a 'weathervane'?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "So you *are* a 'weathervane'?"

fields.Title: You: ""Sounds a bit like you're holding b..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Sounds a bit like you're holding back."
fields.Alternate1: (Squint.) "Are you *denying* me access to information... again?"

fields.Title: Gaston Martin: ""Can I at least finish my fucking s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Can I at least finish my fucking sentence before you piss on it? Is that okay, Ren√©?" His eyes are furious. "I'm not anyone important in the Union. I just know Evrart."

fields.Title: Variable["plaza.gaston_drama_not_lying_but_somethings_off"]
Variable["plaza.gaston_drama_not_lying_but_somethings_off"]
!(Variable["plaza.gaston_drama_not_lying_but_somethings_off"])
Ren√© Arnoux: ""Respects?!" The old carabineer can..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Respects?!" The old carabineer can't believe what he's hearing.

fields.Title: Ren√© Arnoux: ""I hate the socialist rabble," he c..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I hate the socialist rabble," he continues, "but even siding with *them* is better than living your entire life on the fence, never committing to anything. Pick a damn side already!"

fields.Title: Gaston Martin: ""That's just the way things work ar..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's just the way things work around here," he declares merrily. "No reason to feel bad about it."

fields.Title: Gaston Martin: ""No, I'm sorry, officer." he shakes..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No, I'm sorry, officer." he shakes his head. "I don't even have a keycard. Evrart usually sends someone to get me, when he wants to talk."

fields.Title: Gaston Martin: ""I prefer *highly-adaptable* myself..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I prefer *highly-adaptable* myself," he chuckles merrily. "Has a better ring to it, don't you think?"

fields.Title: Gaston Martin: ""Let me think..." He looks at the c..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Let me think..." He looks at the clouds, wistfully. "I heard someone was hanged and left on a tree for a week, but that's all I know really."
